answers.answer: I dont know if its Posted so im gonna post it again I would say yh hun i would ask him or see someone else or phone your hospital and speack to a consultant there and makesure they referred you

I forgot to ask him if I was concidered high risk cuz I had a lot on my mind. We had to put our husky down the same day we got the bad news. I was gonna ask at my appt on Monday just wanted to know if other mommies know more about it. I don't need a second doctor cuz he is a high risk doctor himself. I didn't know until later on in my pregnancy. Its just all confusing and stressful.

question: I'm 34 weeks today and found out yesterday our little girl has tourcherous ductus artiriosis which is only a problem while she is in me. BUT I also have gestational diabetes. I was put on monitoring for twice a week. Me and my husband were wondering if this made me high risk? We forgot to ask our doctor and he won't refer me to a high risk doctor cuz he IS one. Ty for any help.
title: am i high risk now?
